summary: An American spinster's dream of romance finally becomes a bittersweet reality when she meets a handsome--but married--Italian man while vacationing in Venice.
cast: Katharine Hepburn|Rossano Brazzi|Isa Miranda|Darren McGavin|Mari Aldon|Jane Rose|MacDonald Parke|Jeremy Spenser|Gaetano Autiero|Virginia Simeon|David Lean|Tanya Lopert|Andr√© Morell|Angelo Puppin
title: Locuras de verano
